intro.p: The GStreamer team is proud to announce the second bugfix release in the stable 1.8 release series of your favourite cross-platform multimedia framework!
This release only contains bugfixes and it is safe to update from 1.8.1. For a full list of bugfixes see Bugzilla.
See &site;/releases/1.8/ for the full release notes.

bug.summary: timeline: rename " track-element " to " track_element " in select-tracks-for-object documentation
g-i: use only " ges/ges.h " as c-include for introspection
nlecomposition: ensure elements pending to be added are not leaked
ges: ges_asset_set_proxy documentation fix and add some g-i annotations
audio-source: unref private capsfilter reference on finalize
nlecomposition: Fix race condition in seek handling causing deadlocks
ges-uri-asset: GstDiscoverer can return a valid info but a non-OK result, consider this an error
